data.title: "Running Out Of Time," Leann Rimes
data.meta_description: This is my favorite song on the Desperate Housewives soundtrack.  I don't really like much on it, but this is a first-class track from Leann.  Great ballad.  It's definitely more in her pop sty
data.text:
Post by Deleted on

This is my favorite song on the Desperate Housewives soundtrack. I don't really like much on it, but this is a first-class track from Leann. Great ballad. It's definitely more in her pop style though.

Post by benmcd2000 on

Is this a cover? I couldn't agree with you more...this is my personal favorite song from the soundtrack. (even a little more then the Joss Stone track) This is one of those tracks that you really believe the singer is feeling the lyric. LeAnn's vocal is convincing and moving. Regardless of what genre of music she sings, no one can deny that LeAnn Rimes is one of the great female vocalist in the music business today!!

Post by Journey on

No, this isn't a cover. It was a brand new song.

I love this song. Flawless.

I'm still curious if this will appear on the European album but who knows.
